mapper.select: select ( SELECT COUNT(pl.lno) FROM `program_like` pl WHERE pl.pno = #{pno} ) AS `like_num` , IF(( SELECT COUNT(pl.lno) FROM `program_like` pl WHERE pl.pno = #{pno} AND pl.uno = #{uno} ) > 0, true, false) AS `press_like` , IFNULL(( SELECT COUNT(pr.prno) FROM `program_reply` pr WHERE pr.pno = #{pno} ), 0) AS `reply_num` , ( SELECT `content` FROM `program_reply_view` prv WHERE prv.pno = #{pno} ORDER BY prv.like_num DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS `reply_content` from dual
